dict.acceptation: 看见，发现；瞄准；观察；调准瞄准器；

sent.orig: It was love at first sight at last sight at ever and ever sight.
sent.trans: 初见是爱，再见是爱，只要相见永远是爱。

sent.orig: I give sight to the blind, mind sight through the mind.
sent.trans: 我让盲人重见光明，得到来自精神的观点。

sent.orig: We'll agree to change the terms of payment from L at sight at sight.
sent.trans: 我们同意将即期信用证付款方式改为即期付款交单。

sent.orig: Please change the terms of payment at sight at sight.
sent.trans: 请将即期信用证付款改为即期付款交单方式。

sent.orig: Is the credit at sight or after sight?
sent.trans: 信用证是即期的还是远期的？
